mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_id=#{memberId} and flag=2 and food_no=#{foodNo}
mapper.select: select C.*, F.food_name, F.food_market_price, F.food_company from cart C left join food F on C.food_no=F.food_no where C.member_id=#{memberId} and C.flag=2

select distinct market_order_no, market_no, market_order_price, to_char(market_order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order_date, market_order_flag from market_order where market_no=#{memberId} and market_order_enabled=1 order by market_order_no desc
select count(*) from market_order where market_no=#{marketNo} and market_order_enabled=1

select D.market_order_detail_no, O.market_order_no, D.food_no, F.food_name, D.market_order_detail_amount, F.food_market_price, O.market_order_price, O.market_order_flag from market_order_detail D left join market_order O on D.market_order_no= O.market_order_no left join food F on D.food_no= F.food_no where D.market_order_no=#{marketOrderNo} and D.market_order_detail_enabled=1 and O.market_order_enabled=1 order by D.market_order_detail_no desc
select count(*) from market_order_detail where market_order_no=#{marketOrderNo} and market_order_detail_enabled=1
select market_order_flag from market_order where market_order_no=#{marketOrderNo} and market_order_enabled=1
